title: Chuck Spieser
text: Chuck Spieser (August 2, 1929 – December 21, 1996) was an American <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201948%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20heavyweight">men's light heavyweight</a> event at the <a href="1948%20Summer%20Olympics">1948 Summer Olympics</a>.
